titleStmt.title: Of justification four disputations clearing and amicably defending the truth against the unnecessary oppositions of divers learned and reverend brethren / by Richard Baxter ...
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Nevil Simmons ... and are to be sold by him ... and by Nathaniel Elkins ...,

notesStmt.note: The four disputations have special title pages.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
